io.openvidu.java.client

Class RecordingProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.openvidu.java.client.RecordingProperties

  • public class RecordingProperties
extends Object
    See OpenVidu.startRecording(String, RecordingProperties)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RecordingProperties.Builder
      Builder for RecordingProperties

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String customLayout()
      If recordingLayout() is set to RecordingLayout.CUSTOM, this property defines the relative path to the specific custom layout you want to use.
      See Custom recording layouts to learn more
      boolean hasAudio()
      Defines whether to record audio or not.
      boolean hasVideo()
      Defines whether to record video or not.
      String name()
      Defines the name you want to give to the video file.
      Recording.OutputMode outputMode()
      Defines the mode of recording: Recording.OutputMode.COMPOSED for a single archive in a grid layout or Recording.OutputMode.INDIVIDUAL for one archive for each stream.

      Default to Recording.OutputMode.COMPOSED
      RecordingLayout recordingLayout()
      Defines the layout to be used in the recording.
      Will only have effect if RecordingProperties.Builder.outputMode(Recording.OutputMode) has been called with value Recording.OutputMode.COMPOSED.

      Default to RecordingLayout.BEST_FIT
      String resolution()
      Defines the resolution of the recorded video.
      Will only have effect if RecordingProperties.Builder.outputMode(Recording.OutputMode) has been called with value Recording.OutputMode.COMPOSED.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • name

        public String name()
        Defines the name you want to give to the video file. You can access this same value in your clients on recording events (recordingStarted, recordingStopped)

      • outputMode

        public Recording.OutputMode outputMode()
        Defines the mode of recording: Recording.OutputMode.COMPOSED for a single archive in a grid layout or Recording.OutputMode.INDIVIDUAL for one archive for each stream.

        Default to Recording.OutputMode.COMPOSED

      • recordingLayout

        public RecordingLayout recordingLayout()
        Defines the layout to be used in the recording.
        Will only have effect if RecordingProperties.Builder.outputMode(Recording.OutputMode) has been called with value Recording.OutputMode.COMPOSED.

        Default to RecordingLayout.BEST_FIT

      • customLayout

        public String customLayout()
        If recordingLayout() is set to RecordingLayout.CUSTOM, this property defines the relative path to the specific custom layout you want to use.
        See Custom recording layouts to learn more

      • resolution

        public String resolution()
        Defines the resolution of the recorded video.
        Will only have effect if RecordingProperties.Builder.outputMode(Recording.OutputMode) has been called with value Recording.OutputMode.COMPOSED. For Recording.OutputMode.INDIVIDUAL all individual video files will have the native resolution of the published stream.

        Default to "1920x1080"

      • hasAudio

        public boolean hasAudio()
        Defines whether to record audio or not. Cannot be set to false at the same time as hasVideo().

        Default to true

      • hasVideo

        public boolean hasVideo()
        Defines whether to record video or not. Cannot be set to false at the same time as hasAudio().

        Default to true
